paper_abstract: In this paper, we derive the relationship between local weight enumerator of q-ary 1-perfect code in a face and that in the orthogonal face. As an application of our result, we compute the local weight enumerators of a shortened, doubly-shortened, and triply-shortened q-ary 1-perfect code.
paper_title: Local duality theorem for q-ary 1-perfect codes
